deprecated_yaml.title: The Dynalite YAML configuration is being removed
deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring Dynalite using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the Dynalite YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
